import React from 'react' import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function PostPage() { const { id } = useParams(); const post = posts.find(post => (post.id).toString() === id); return (
{post && <>

{post.title}

{post.datetime}

{post.body}

} {!post && <>

Post Not Found

Well, that's disappointing.

Visit Our Homepage

}
) } export default PostPage
